name: SIGNAL SEEKERS
description:
This illustration depicts a story about a robot that really glorify internet signals.

nowadays, technology is a main part in our life, where everything is connected and depended each other. 
signal has special part on this role, it is the most important thing in our technology era. 

our gadget is nothing without signal. The function will be less essential without internet signal, and we can say that we are really dependent with that. even we can be angrier if we lost the signal than we lost our close person’s attention. 
so ironic!. 


digitally hand drawn, 
GIF 2500 x 2500 pixel 
DPI 300
